product_name: Ellington Annie Crossbody Handbag - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether you're headed downtown or around the world, the petite Ellington Annie Crossbody Handbag keeps your essentials close at hand without weighing you down. Nylon strap adjusts to shoulder or crossbody carry; strap measures 15 - 27 in. from top of strap to top of bag. 2 exterior zip pockets; slip pocket on back. Zippered main compartment has an interior slip pocket and key clip. Ellington Annie Crossbody handbag features a light-colored nylon interior that makes it easy to find small items. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you're headed downtown or around the world, the petite Ellington Annie Crossbody Handbag keeps your essentials close at hand without weighing you down.
